Documentation.name: hoToolsBasic
Documentation.notes: hoTools simple technology - Basic Scripts - Basic Searches

RootTable.Filter: select o.ea_GUID AS CLASSGUID, o.object_type AS CLASSTYPE, o.Name As [Artifact], o.Alias as alias, o.pdata5 As Keyword, o.ModifiedDate As Modified, f.fileName, o.Note from t_object o inner join t_objectFiles f on (o.object_id = f.object_id) where o.object_type = 'Artifact' AND (o.pdata5 like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' or o.name like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' or o.alias like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' or f.fileName like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' ) order by name

select dia.ea_GUID as CLASSGUID, dia.Diagram_id AS CLASSTYPE, dia.name As Dia_Name, dia.diagram_type, con.name As Connector_Name, con.Connector_Type , con.stereotype, src.name As Source, trgt.name As Target
from ((((t_diagramlinks l INNER JOIN t_connector con on (con.Connector_id = l.ConnectorID)) INNER JOIN t_diagram dia on (dia.diagram_id = l.diagramid)) INNER JOIN t_object src on (con.start_object_id = src.object_id)) INNER JOIN t_object trgt on (con.end_object_id = trgt.object_id))
where
con.Connector_id = 237936 AND
l.hidden = 0

select d.ea_GUID As CLASSGUID, d.diagram_type As CLASSTYPE, d.name As Diagram, d.diagram_type As Type, d.Author,d.modifiedDate As Modified, d.notes As [Notes] from t_diagram d where #DB=ORACLE# Upper(d.name) like Upper('<Search Term>#WC#') #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# d.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=JET# #DB=Other# d.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# d.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=SQLSVR# order by 3

SELECT d.ea_GUID AS CLASSGUID, d.diagram_type AS CLASSTYPE, d.ModifiedDate,
#DB=ORACLE# /* Modified diagrams */ #DB=ORACLE# #DB=ORACLE# Trunc(SYSDATE - d.ModifiedDate) As "Days" #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# DateDiff("d",d.ModifiedDate,Now()) As "Days" #DB=JET# #DB=Other# d.ModifiedDate - date('now') As "Days" #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# DATEDIFF(day, d.ModifiedDate, getdate()) #DB=SQLSVR#
,d.Name, d.diagram_type As Type, d.Author, u.firstname, u.surname, d.StereoType, d.CreatedDate
FROM t_diagram d left join t_secuser u on u.userlogin = d.author WHERE d.package_id in ( #Branch#) and d.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' Order By modifiedDate desc

Select o.ea_GUID AS CLASSGUID, o.object_type As CLASSTYPE, o.name, o.Object_Type AS Type, o.stereotype,'Reference to diagram' As Usage, dia.name As Diagram_Name, dia.diagram_type
#DB=DUMMY# /* Reference to Diagram */ #DB=DUMMY# from #DB=JET# t_object o INNER JOIN t_diagram dia on ( o.pdata1 = Format(dia.diagram_id )) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# t_object o INNER JOIN t_diagram dia on ( o.pdata1 = dia.diagram_id ) #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# t_object o INNER JOIN t_diagram dia on ( o.pdata1 = dia.diagram_id ) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# t_object o INNER JOIN t_diagram dia on ( o.pdata1 = Cast(dia.diagram_id as Varchar2(39)) ) #DB=ORACLE#
where dia.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o.object_type in ('InteractionOccurrence', 'Text', 'UMLDiagram')
UNION
Select o.ea_GUID , o.object_type , o.name, o.Object_Type , o.stereotype, 'Composite of diagram' , ' ', ' '
from t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (x.client = o.ea_GUID) where x.supplier = '<Search Term>'
order by 3,4,5

select ea_GUID As CLASSGUID, Object_type As CLASSTYPE, name As Class, name As LongName, Object_type As Type, Stereotype, Author, #DB=ORACLE# TO_CHAR(modifiedDate, 'dd.mm.yyyy hh24.mm') As Modified, #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# modifiedDate As Modified, #DB=JET# #DB=Other# modifiedDate As Modified, #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# modifiedDate As Modified, #DB=SQLSVR#
#DB=ORACLE# Cast(note As Varchar2(200)) As Notes #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# Mid(note,1,200) As Notes #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(note,1,200) As Notes #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(note,1,200) As Notes #DB=SQLSVR# from t_object e where #DB=ORACLE#Upper(name) like Upper('<Search Term>#WC#') AND Object_Type NOT IN ('Package', 'Text') #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# name like '<Search Term>#WC#' AND Object_Type NOT IN ('Package', 'Text') #DB=JET# #DB=Other# name like '<Search Term>#WC#' AND Object_Type NOT IN ('Package', 'Text') #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# name like '<Search Term>#WC#' AND Object_Type NOT IN ('Package', 'Text') #DB=SQLSVR#
UNION select a.ea_GUID , 'Attribute', o.name, a.name , 'Attribute', a.Stereotype, ' ', ' ', #DB=ORACLE# Cast(note As Varchar2(200)) As Notes #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# Mid(note,1,200) As Notes #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(note,1,200) As Notes #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(note,1,200) As Notes #DB=SQLSVR# from t_attribute a, t_object o where #DB=ORACLE# Upper(a.name) like Upper('<Search Term>#WC#') #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# a.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=JET# #DB=Other# a.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# a.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=SQLSVR# and a.object_ID = o.Object_ID
UNION select op.ea_GUID , 'Operation', o.name, op.name , 'Operation', op.Stereotype, ' ', ' ', #DB=ORACLE# Cast(note As Varchar2(200)) As Notes #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# Mid(note,1,200) As Notes #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(note,1,200) As Notes #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(note,1,200) As Notes #DB=SQLSVR# from t_operation op, t_object o where op.object_ID = o.Object_ID AND #DB=ORACLE# Upper(op.name) like Upper('<Search Term>#WC#') #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# op.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=JET# #DB=Other# op.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# op.name like '<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=SQLSVR# order by 3,4

select o.ea_GUID As CLASSGUID, o.Object_type As CLASSTYPE, o.name , o.Object_type As Type, o.Stereotype, o.Author, o.modifiedDate As Modified,
#DB=ORACLE# /* Modified diagrams */ #DB=ORACLE# #DB=ORACLE# Trunc(SYSDATE - o.ModifiedDate) As "Days" #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# DateDiff("d",o.ModifiedDate,Now()) As "Days" #DB=JET# #DB=Other# date('now') - o.ModifiedDate As "Days" #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# DATEDIFF(day, o.ModifiedDate, getdate()) #DB=SQLSVR#
,o.note As [Notes]
from t_object o, t_package pkg
where
pkg.Package_id in (#Branch#)
AND o.Package_ID = pkg.package_id
AND o.Object_Type NOT IN ('Package', 'Text')
AND o.name <> ' '
AND o.name not in ('target', 'Merge', 'ActivityFinal', 'ActivityInitial')
AND o.name like '<Search Term>#WC#'
order by 3,4

SELECT DISTINCT o.ea_GUID as CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type as CLASSTYPE, o.name As Item, o.Object_Type As ItemType, o.stereotype As ItemStereotype, 'Connector' As ConnectorType, c.Name, c.Stereotype
FROM t_object o, t_xref xCon, t_xref xFlow, t_connector c, t_connector flow where c.connector_ID = <Search Term> and c.ea_GUID = xCon.Client and xCon.Behavior = 'abstraction' and flow.ea_GUID in ( #DB=SQLSVR# substring(xCon.description,0,39), substring(xCon.description,39,39), substring(xCon.description,78,39), substring(xCon.description,117,39), substring(xCon.description,156,39), substring(xCon.description,195,39), substring(xCon.description,234,39), substring(xCon.description,273,39), substring(xCon.description,312,39), substring(xCon.description,351,39) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# SubStr(Cast(xCon.description As Varchar(39)),0,38), SubStr(Cast(xCon.description As Varchar(39)),40,38), SubStr(Cast(xCon.description As Varchar(39)),79,38), SubStr(Cast(xCon.description As Varchar(39)),118,38), SubStr(Cast(xCon.description As Varchar(39)),157,38), SubStr(Cast(xCon.description As Varchar(39)),196,38), SubStr(Cast(xCon.description As Varchar(39)),235,38), SubStr(Cast(xCon.description As Varchar(39)),274,38), SubStr(Cast(xCon.description As Varchar(39)),313,38), SubStr(Cast(xCon.description As Varchar(39)),352,38)
#DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# left(xCon.description,38), mid(xCon.description,40,38), mid(xCon.description,79,38), mid(xCon.description,118,38), mid(xCon.description,157,38), mid(xCon.description,196,38), mid(xCon.description,235,38), mid(xCon.description,274,38), mid(xCon.description,313,38), mid(xCon.description,352,38) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(xCon.description,0,38), Substr(xCon.description,40,38), Substr(xCon.description,79,38), Substr(xCon.description,118,38), Substr(xCon.description,157,38), Substr(xCon.description,196,38), Substr(xCon.description,235,38), Substr(xCon.description,274,38), Substr(xCon.description,313,38), Substr(xCon.description,352,38) #DB=Other# ) AND flow.ea_GUID = xFlow.client AND o.ea_GUID in ( #DB=SQLSVR# substring(xFlow.description,0,39), substring(xFlow.description,39,39), substring(xFlow.description,78,39), substring(xFlow.description,117,39), substring(xFlow.description,156,39), substring(xFlow.description,195,39), substring(xFlow.description,234,39), substring(xFlow.description,273,39), substring(xFlow.description,312,39), substring(xFlow.description,351,39) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# SubStr(Cast(xFlow.description As Varchar(39)),0,38), SubStr(Cast(xFlow.description As Varchar(39)),40,38), SubStr(Cast(xFlow.description As Varchar(39)),79,38), SubStr(Cast(xFlow.description As Varchar(39)),118,38), SubStr(Cast(xFlow.description As Varchar(39)),157,38), SubStr(Cast(xFlow.description As Varchar(39)),196,38), SubStr(Cast(xFlow.description As Varchar(39)),235,38), SubStr(Cast(xFlow.description As Varchar(39)),274,38), SubStr(Cast(xFlow.description As Varchar(39)),313,38), SubStr(Cast(xFlow.description As Varchar(39)),352,38)
#DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# left(xFlow.description,38), mid(xFlow.description,40,38), mid(xFlow.description,79,38), mid(xFlow.description,118,38), mid(xFlow.description,157,38), mid(xFlow.description,196,38), mid(xFlow.description,235,38), mid(xFlow.description,274,38), mid(xFlow.description,313,38), mid(xFlow.description,352,38) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(xFlow.description,0,38), Substr(xFlow.description,40,38), Substr(xFlow.description,79,38), Substr(xFlow.description,118,38), Substr(xFlow.description,157,38), Substr(xFlow.description,196,38), Substr(xFlow.description,235,38), Substr(xFlow.description,274,38), Substr(xFlow.description,313,38), Substr(xFlow.description,352,38) #DB=Other# ) UNION SELECT DISTINCT o.ea_GUID , o.Object_Type , o.name, o.Object_Type, o.stereotype, 'Information Flow', c.Name, c.Stereotype
FROM t_object o, t_xref x, t_connector c where x.client = c.ea_GUID and x.Behavior = 'conveyed' and c.connector_ID = <Search Term> and o.ea_GUID in ( #DB=SQLSVR# substring(x.description,0,39), substring(x.description,39,39), substring(x.description,78,39), substring(x.description,117,39), substring(x.description,156,39), substring(x.description,195,39), substring(x.description,234,39), substring(x.description,273,39), substring(x.description,312,39), substring(x.description,351,39) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# SubStr(Cast(x.description As Varchar(39)),0,38), SubStr(Cast(x.description As Varchar(39)),40,38), SubStr(Cast(x.description As Varchar(39)),79,38), SubStr(Cast(x.description As Varchar(39)),118,38), SubStr(Cast(x.description As Varchar(39)),157,38), SubStr(Cast(x.description As Varchar(39)),196,38), SubStr(Cast(x.description As Varchar(39)),235,38), SubStr(Cast(x.description As Varchar(39)),274,38), SubStr(Cast(x.description As Varchar(39)),313,38), SubStr(Cast(x.description As Varchar(39)),352,38)
#DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# left(x.description,38), mid(x.description,40,38), mid(x.description,79,38), mid(x.description,118,38), mid(x.description,157,38), mid(x.description,196,38), mid(x.description,235,38), mid(x.description,274,38), mid(x.description,313,38), mid(x.description,352,38) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(x.description,0,38), Substr(x.description,40,38), Substr(x.description,79,38), Substr(x.description,118,38), Substr(x.description,157,38), Substr(x.description,196,38), Substr(x.description,235,38), Substr(x.description,274,38), Substr(x.description,313,38), Substr(x.description,352,38) #DB=Other# )
order by 3,4,5

select o.ea_GUID As CLASSGUID, o.Object_type As CLASSTYPE,
'Behaviour / Classifier' As Usage, o.name As Name, o.Object_Type As Type, o.stereotype As Stereotype
from t_operation op, t_object o
where op.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# op.Behaviour = o.ea_GUID #DB=JET# #DB=Other# op.Behaviour = o.ea_GUID #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(op.Behaviour As Varchar2(38)) = o.ea_GUID #DB=ORACLE# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(op.Behaviour,1,38) = o.ea_GUID #DB=SQLSVR#
#DB=ORACLE#
/* --------------------------------------------------------Find State Operation from Class operation (do,entry,exit) -----------------------------------*/
#DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select op.ea_GUID , 'Operation' , 'Operation of Class or State', op.name , Type, op.stereotype from t_operation op where #DB=JET# op.Behaviour = '<Search Term>' #DB=JET# #DB=Other# op.Behaviour = '<Search Term>' #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(op.Behaviour As Varchar2(38)) = '<Search Term>' #DB=ORACLE# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(op.Behaviour,1,38) = '<Search Term>' #DB=SQLSVR#
#DB=ORACLE#
/* --------------------------------------------------------Find Class Operation from State operation (do,entry,exit) -----------------------------------*/
#DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select op.ea_GUID , 'Operation' , 'Operation Class<--> State', op.name , op.Type, op.stereotype
from t_operation opState, t_operation op
where
#DB=JET# opState.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# #DB=JET# opState.Behaviour = op.ea_GUID #DB=JET#
#DB=Other# opState.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=Other# #DB=Other# opState.Behaviour = op.ea_GUID #DB=Other#
#DB=ORACLE# Cast(opState.Behaviour as Varchar2(38)) = '<Search term>' AND #DB=ORACLE# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(opState.Behaviour As Varchar2(38)) = op.ea_GUID #DB=ORACLE#
#DB=SQLSVR# opState.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(opState.Behaviour,1,38) = op.ea_GUID #DB=SQLSVR#
#DB=ORACLE#
/* --------------------------------------------------------Find Call Action -----------------------------------*/
#DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select o.ea_GUID , o.Object_Type , 'Call Action', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_operation op, t_object o where o.Classifier_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o.Classifier_GUID = op.ea_GUID
#DB=ORACLE#
/* --------------------------------------------------------Find Call from Action of type Call Operation -----------------------------------*/
#DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select op.ea_GUID , 'Operation' , 'Call Operation', op.name , 'Operation', op.stereotype from t_operation op, t_object o where o.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o.Classifier_GUID = op.ea_GUID
#DB=ORACLE#
/* --------------------------------------------------------Find Activity from Action of type Call Behavior -----------------------------------*/
#DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select o.ea_GUID , o.Object_Type , 'Behavior', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_object o, t_object o1 where o1.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o1.Classifier_GUID = o.ea_GUID
#DB=ORACLE#
/* --------------------------------------------------------Find Instances from Classifier -----------------------------------*/
#DB=ORACLE#
UNION select o.ea_GUID , o.Object_Type , 'Object', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_object o, t_object o1 where o1.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o.Classifier_GUID = o1.ea_GUID
#DB=ORACLE#
/* --------------------------------------------------------Find return type of method-----------------------------------*/
#DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select o.ea_GUID , o.Object_Type , 'ReturnType', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_operation op, t_object o , t_object o1 where op.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# Format(o.Object_ID) = op.Classifier AND #DB=JET# #DB=Other# o.Object_ID = op.Classifier AND #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.Object_ID As Varchar2(38)) = op.Classifier AND #DB=ORACLE# #DB=SQLSVR# o.Object_ID = op.Classifier AND #DB=SQLSVR#
op.object_id = o1.object_id
#DB=ORACLE# /*================== Operation Parameter ==============================================*/ #DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select op.ea_GUID , 'Operation', #DB=JET# 'ParameterType ' & opp.Name & ':' & opp.Type, #DB=JET# #DB=Other# 'ParameterType ' & opp.Name & ':' & opp.Type, #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Concat(opp.Name,':'), #DB=ORACLE# #DB=SQLSVR# 'ParameterType ' + opp.Name + ':' + opp.Type, #DB=SQLSVR# o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_operation op, t_object o, t_object o1, t_operationparams opp where o.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# Format(o.Object_ID) = opp.Classifier AND #DB=JET# #DB=Other# o.Object_ID = opp.Classifier AND #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.Object_ID As Varchar2(38)) = opp.Classifier AND #DB=ORACLE# #DB=SQLSVR# o.Object_ID = opp.Classifier AND #DB=SQLSVR#
op.OperationID = opp.OperationID AND op.object_id = o1.object_id
#DB=ORACLE# /*================== Operation used in Sequence Diagram ==============================================
*/#DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select o.ea_GUID , o.Object_type, 'Sequence Message', o.name, o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_connectortag conTag, t_connector con, t_object o where conTag.Value = '<Search Term>' AND conTag.ElementID = con.Connector_ID AND con.End_Object_ID = o.Object_ID
#DB=ORACLE# /*================== Attribute and its type ==============================================
*/#DB=ORACLE#
UNION select o.ea_GUID , o.Object_Type, 'Attrubute Type', o.name, o.Object_Type, o.stereotype from t_attribute a, t_object o where a.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# Format(o.Object_ID) = a.Classifier #DB=JET# #DB=Other# o.Object_ID = a.Classifier #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.Object_ID As Varchar2(38)) = a.Classifier #DB=ORACLE# #DB=SQLSVR# o.Object_ID = a.Classifier #DB=SQLSVR#
#DB=ORACLE# /*================== Classifier used in Attribute ==============================================
*/#DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select a.ea_GUID ,'Attribute', 'Attrubute Type', a.name, 'Attribute', o.stereotype from t_attribute a, t_object o where o.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=JET# Format(o.Object_ID) = a.Classifier #DB=JET# #DB=Other# o.Object_ID = a.Classifier #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.Object_ID As Number) = a.Classifier #DB=ORACLE# #DB=SQLSVR# o.Object_ID = a.Classifier #DB=SQLSVR#
#DB=ORACLE# /*================== Part / Object of class ==============================================
*/#DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select o.ea_GUID ,o.Object_type, 'Part',
#DB=JET# o.name + ':' + o1.name, #DB=JET# #DB=Other# o.name + ':' + o1.name, #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Concat( ':' , o1.name), #DB=ORACLE# #DB=SQLSVR# o.name + ':' + o1.name, #DB=SQLSVR#
o.object_type, o.stereotype from t_object o, t_object o1 where o1.ea_GUID = o.PDATA1 AND o.PDATA1 = '<Search Term>'
#DB=ORACLE# /*================== Class of Part ==============================================
*/#DB=ORACLE#
UNION select o.ea_GUID ,o.Object_type, 'Part', #DB=JET# o.name + ':' + o1.name, #DB=JET# #DB=Other# o.name + ':' + o1.name, #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Concat( ':' , o1.name), #DB=ORACLE# #DB=SQLSVR# o.name + ':' + o1.name, #DB=SQLSVR#
o.object_type, o.stereotype from t_object o, t_object o1 where o1.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o1.PDATA1 = o.ea_GUID #DB=ORACLE#
/*================== Usage in Diagram ==============================================
*/
#DB=ORACLE#
UNION select d.ea_GUID, d.Diagram_Type, 'Diagram', d.name,d.Diagram_Type,d.stereotype from t_diagram d, t_diagramobjects do, t_object o where d.diagram_ID = do.diagram_ID AND do.Object_ID = o.Object_ID AND o.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'
UNION #DB=ORACLE# /* Trigger for Action */ #DB=ORACLE#
select o.ea_GUID , o.Object_type , 'Trigger for Action', o.name , o.Object_Type , o.stereotype from #DB=JET# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (Mid(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_GUID or Mid(x.description,40,38) = o.ea_GUID)) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (Substr(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_GUID or Substr(x.description,40,38) = o.ea_GUID)) #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (Substring(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_GUID or Substring(x.description,40,38) = o.ea_GUID)) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (to_char(Substr(Description,1,38)) = o.ea_GUID or to_char(Substr(Description,40,38)) = o.ea_GUID) ) #DB=ORACLE# INNER JOIN t_object o1 on (x.client = o1.ea_GUID)
where x.behavior = 'trigger' AND o1.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'
UNION
#DB=ORACLE# /* Action for Trigger */ #DB=ORACLE# select o1.ea_GUID , o1.Object_type , 'Action for Trigger' , o1.name , o1.Object_Type , o1.stereotype from #DB=JET# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (Mid(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_GUID or Mid(x.description,40,38) = o.ea_GUID)) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (Substr(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_GUID or Substr(x.description,40,38) = o.ea_GUID)) #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (Substring(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_GUID or Substring(x.description,40,38) = o.ea_GUID)) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# (t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object o on (to_char(Substr(Description,1,38)) = o.ea_GUID or to_char(Substr(Description,40,38)) = o.ea_GUID) ) #DB=ORACLE# INNER JOIN t_object o1 on (x.client = o1.ea_GUID) where x.behavior = 'trigger' AND o.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'
UNION
#DB=ORACLE# /* Signal for Trigger */ #DB=ORACLE# select sig.ea_GUID , sig.Object_type , 'Signal for Trigger' , sig.name , sig.Object_Type , sig.stereotype from #DB=JET# t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object sig on (Mid(x.description,9,38) = sig.ea_GUID) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object sig on (Substr(x.description,9,38) = sig.ea_GUID) #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object sig on (Substring(x.description,9,38) = sig.ea_GUID) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object sig on (to_char(Substr(Description,9,38)) = sig.ea_GUID) #DB=ORACLE# where x.client = '<Search Term>' AND Behavior = 'event'
UNION #DB=ORACLE# /* Signal for Trigger */ #DB=ORACLE# select trig.ea_GUID , trig.Object_type , 'Trigger for Signal' , trig.name , trig.Object_Type , trig.stereotype from t_xref x INNER JOIN t_object trig on (x.client = trig.ea_GUID ) where #DB=JET# Mid(x.description,9,38) = '<Search Term>' #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(x.description,9,38) = '<Search Term>' #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(x.description,9,38) = '<Search Term>' #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# to_char(Substr(Description,9,38)) = '<Search Term>' #DB=ORACLE# AND Behavior = 'event'
UNION
#DB=ORACLE# /* Hyperlink auf Diagram */ #DB=ORACLE# Select lnk.ea_GUID , lnk.Object_type , 'Hyperlink to Diagram' , lnk.name , lnk.Object_Type , lnk.stereotype from t_object lnk LEFT JOIN t_diagram dia on #DB=JET# ( lnk.pdata1 = Format(dia.diagram_ID ) ) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# ( lnk.pdata1 = dia.diagram_ID ) #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# ( lnk.pdata1 = dia.diagram_ID ) #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=ORACLE# ( lnk.pdata1 = Cast(dia.diagram_ID As Varchar2(20))) #DB=ORACLE# Where dia.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'
UNION
select trgt.ea_GUID, trgt.object_type, 'Trigger', o.name,o.object_Type,o.stereotype FROM t_xref x, t_connector con, t_object o ,t_object trgt where x.Behavior = 'trigger' AND x.client = con.ea_GUID AND #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_GUID AND #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=JET# Mid(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_GUID AND #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(x.description,1,38) = o.ea_GUID AND #DB=Other# con.start_object_id = trgt.object_id AND o.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'
Order By 3,4
#DB=ORACLE#
/* The search finds the following references for a Method with the Id as a 'Search Term':
- Specified by Aktivity
- Return type
- Parameter Type
- Called by Action
*/
#DB=ORACLE#

select o.ea_GUID AS CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type As CLASSTYPE, o.Name, o.Object_Type, o.stereotype, o.Author, #DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.ModifiedDate As Varchar(20)) As Modified, #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# o.ModifiedDate As Modified, #DB=JET# #DB=Other# o.ModifiedDate As Modified, #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# o.ModifiedDate As Modified, #DB=SQLSVR#
#DB=ORACLE# Cast(SubStr(o.note,1,200) As Varchar(200)) As Notes #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# Mid(o.note,1,200) As Notes #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(o.note,1,200) As Notes #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(o.note,1,200) As Notes #DB=SQLSVR#
from t_object o left Join t_objectproperties op on (o.Object_ID = op.Object_ID AND Property in ('MKS_id', 'MKS_suspect')) where o.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'
UNION
select d.ea_GUID, d.Diagram_Type , d.Name, d.Diagram_Type, d.stereotype, d.Author, #DB=ORACLE# Cast(d.ModifiedDate As Varchar(20)) As Modified, #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# d.ModifiedDate As Modified, #DB=JET# #DB=Other# d.ModifiedDate As Modified, #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# d.ModifiedDate As Modified, #DB=SQLSVR#
#DB=ORACLE# Cast(SubStr(d.notes,1,200) As Varchar(200)) #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# Mid(d.notes,1,200) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(d.notes,1,200) #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(d.notes,1,200) As Notes #DB=SQLSVR# from t_diagram d where d.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'
UNION select a.ea_GUID, 'Attribute' , a.Name, a.type, a.stereotype, ' ', ' ', #DB=ORACLE# Cast(SubStr(a.notes,1,200) As Varchar(200)) #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# Mid(a.notes,1,200) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(a.notes,1,200) #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(a.notes,1,200) As Notes #DB=SQLSVR#
from t_attribute a where a.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'
UNION select op.ea_GUID, 'Operation' , op.Name, 'Operation', op.stereotype, ' ',' ', #DB=ORACLE# Cast(SubStr(op.notes,1,200) As Varchar(200)) #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# Mid(op.notes,1,200) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(op.notes,1,200) #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(op.notes,1,200) As Notes #DB=SQLSVR# from t_operation op where op.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'
#DB=ORACLE# /* Connector */ #DB=ORACLE# UNION select c.ea_GUID, c.connector_Type , c.Name, 'Connector', c.stereotype, d.name,d.ea_GUID, #DB=ORACLE# Cast(SubStr(c.notes,1,200) As Varchar(200)) #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# Mid(c.notes,1,200) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(c.notes,1,200) #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(c.notes,1,200) As Notes #DB=SQLSVR# from (t_connector c LEFT JOIN t_diagramlinks dl on c.connector_id = dl.connectorid) LEFT JOIN t_diagram d on d.Diagram_id = dl.diagramid where c.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'
#DB=ORACLE# /* Operation Parameter */ #DB=ORACLE# UNION select opp.ea_GUID, 'Parameter' , opp.Name, 'Parameter', '', opp.name,opp.ea_GUID, #DB=ORACLE# Cast(SubStr(opp.notes,1,200) As Varchar(200)) #DB=ORACLE# #DB=JET# Mid(opp.notes,1,200) #DB=JET# #DB=Other# Substr(opp.notes,1,200) #DB=Other# #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(opp.notes,1,200) As Notes #DB=SQLSVR# from t_operationparams opp where opp.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>'

select o.ea_GUID As CLASSGUID, o.Object_type As CLASSTYPE, 'Behaviour' As Usage, o.name As ElementName, o.Object_Type As ElementType, o.stereotype As ElementStereotype, '' As Diagram, pkg.name As PackageName, o.ea_GUID from t_operation op, t_object o INNER JOIN t_package pkg on (o.package_id =pkg.package_id) where op.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(op.Behaviour ,1,39)= o.ea_GUID #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=JET# op.Behaviour = o.ea_GUID #DB=JET# #DB=Other# op.Behaviour = o.ea_GUID #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(op.Behaviour As Varchar2(38)) = o.ea_GUID #DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select op.ea_GUID , 'Operation' , 'Operation Class<--> State', op.name , Type, op.stereotype, '', '',op.ea_GUID from t_operation op where
#DB=SQLSVR# Substring(op.Behaviour ,1,39) = '<Search Term>' #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=JET# op.Behaviour = '<Search Term>' #DB=JET# #DB=Other# op.Behaviour = '<Search Term>' #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(op.Behaviour As Varchar2(38)) = '<Search Term>' #DB=ORACLE# UNION select op.ea_GUID , 'Operation' , 'Operation Class<--> State', op.name , op.Type, op.stereotype,'', '',op.ea_GUID from t_operation opState, t_operation op where opState.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=SQLSVR# Substring(opState.Behaviour,1,39) = op.ea_GUID #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=JET# opState.Behaviour = op.ea_GUID #DB=JET# #DB=Other# opState.Behaviour = op.ea_GUID #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# Cast(op.Behaviour As Varchar2(38)) = op.ea_GUID #DB=ORACLE#
#DB=ORACLE# UNION select o.ea_GUID , o.Object_Type , 'Call Action', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype ,'', pkg.name, o.ea_GUID from t_operation op, t_object o INNER JOIN t_package pkg on (o.package_id =pkg.package_id) where o.Classifier_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND o.Classifier_GUID = op.ea_GUID /* --------------------------------------------------------Find Call Action -----------------------------------*/
#DB=ORACLE#
UNION select o.ea_GUID , o.Object_Type , 'ReturnType', o.name , o.Object_Type, o.stereotype,'', pkg.name, o.ea_GUID from t_operation op, t_object o1, t_object o INNER JOIN t_package pkg on (o.package_id =pkg.package_id) where op.ea_GUID = '<Search Term>' AND #DB=SQLSVR# o.Object_ID = op.Classifier #DB=SQLSVR# #DB=JET# Format(o.Object_ID) = op.Classifier #DB=JET# #DB=Other# o.Object_ID= op.Classifier #DB=Other# #DB=ORACLE# o.Object_ID = op.Classifier #DB=ORACLE# AND op.object_id = o1.object_id
#DB=ORACLE# /* Usage in Sequence Diagram */ #DB=ORACLE#
UNION select c.ea_GUID , c.connector_type , 'Sequence' , c.name , 'Operation2', o.stereotype ,d.name, '',c.ea_GUID from t_connector c, t_object o, t_operation op, t_diagram d, t_diagramlinks dl where c.end_object_id = o.object_id AND o.object_id = op.object_id AND '<Search Term>' = op.ea_GUID AND dl.diagramID = d.diagram_ID AND dl.connectorID = c.connector_id AND d.Diagram_Type = "Sequence"
UNION select c.ea_GUID , c.connector_type , 'Sequence' , c.name , 'Operation2', o.stereotype, d.name, '', c.ea_GUID
from t_connector c, t_object o1, t_object o, t_operation op, t_diagram d, t_diagramlinks dl where c.end_object_id = o1.object_id AND o1.object_id = o.object_id AND o.object_id = op.object_id AND '<Search Term>' = op.ea_GUID AND dl.diagramID = d.diagram_ID AND dl.connectorID = c.connector_id AND d.Diagram_Type = "Sequence" Order By 3,4

select ea_GUID As CLASSGUID, Object_type As CLASSTYPE, name As Class, '' As Name2, Object_type As Type, Stereotype, Author,
#DB=ORACLE# TO_CHAR(modifiedDate, 'dd.mm.yyyy hh24.mm') As Modified #DB=ORACLE# #DB=Other# modifiedDate As Modified #DB=Other#
from t_object e where #DB=ORACLE#Upper(name) like Upper('#WC#<Search Term>#WC#') #DB=ORACLE# #DB=Other# name like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=Other# AND Object_type in ('Class', 'Component','Interface','Activity','Requirement','Enumeration','DataType')
UNION
select a.ea_GUID , 'Attribute', a.name, o.name , 'Attribute', a.Stereotype, ' ', ' ' from t_attribute a, t_object o
where
#DB=ORACLE# Upper(a.name) like Upper('#WC#<Search Term>#WC#') #DB=ORACLE# #DB=Other# a.name like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=Other# and a.object_ID = o.Object_ID
UNION select op.ea_GUID , 'Operation', op.name, o.name , 'Operation', o.Stereotype, ' ', ' '
from t_operation op, t_object o
where
#DB=ORACLE# Upper(op.name) like Upper('#WC#<Search Term>#WC#') #DB=ORACLE# #DB=Other# op.name like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=Other# and op.object_ID = o.Object_ID UNION
select o.ea_GUID AS CLASSGUID, o.Object_Type As CLASSTYPE, o.Name, o.name, o.Object_Type, o.stereotype, o.Author,
#DB=ORACLE# Cast(o.ModifiedDate As Varchar(20)) As Modified #DB=ORACLE# #DB=Other# o.ModifiedDate As Modified #DB=Other#
from t_object o where o.ea_GUID like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'
UNION
select ea_GUID As CLASSGUID, diagram_type As CLASSTYPE, name , '', diagram_type, d.Stereotype, Author, #DB=ORACLE# TO_CHAR(modifiedDate, 'dd.mm.yyyy hh24.mm') As Modified #DB=ORACLE# #DB=Other# modifiedDate As Modified #DB=Other#
from t_diagram d where d.ea_GUID like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'
UNION
select a.ea_GUID , 'Attribute', a.name, '', 'Attribute', a.Stereotype, ' ', ' ' from t_attribute a where a.ea_GUID like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'
UNION
select op.ea_GUID, 'Operation' , op.Name, '', 'Operation', op.stereotype, ' ',' ' from t_operation op where op.ea_GUID like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' #DB=ORACLE# /* Connector */ #DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select c.ea_GUID, c.connector_Type , c.Name, '', 'Connector', c.stereotype, d.name,d.ea_GUID from (t_connector c LEFT JOIN t_diagramlinks dl on c.connector_id = dl.connectorid) LEFT JOIN t_diagram d on d.Diagram_id = dl.diagramid where c.ea_GUID like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#'
#DB=ORACLE# /* Operation Parameter */ #DB=ORACLE#
UNION
select opp.ea_GUID , 'OperationParameter', opp.name, opp.name , type, '', ' ','' from t_operationparams opp where opp.ea_GUID like '#WC#<Search Term>#WC#' order by 3,4
